import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './App.css'; class DailyGoals extends Component { render() { const{dailyGoals, deleteGoal} = this.props; const displayCheckBoxes = (goal) =>{ // let len = document.querySelector('.dailyheading').clientWidth; let len = 9 for(let i = 0; i < len; i++){ return(
) } } const displayDailyGoals = dailyGoals.map(goal => { return(

{goal.title}

{goal.snippit}
{displayCheckBoxes(goal)}
) }) return (
{ displayDailyGoals }
) } } export default DailyGoals
